title: Have I Got News for You (New Episode)
overview: Have I Got News for You is the comedy panel show which delivers comic observations from the satirical to the surreal through the lens of a news quiz show. An institution in Britain, this an award-winning comedy series is now invading America! Always relevant and topical, the series serves up a smart, silly, opinionated, and edgy take on the news of the week featuring a rotating collection of comedians, pundits, politicos, and entertainers. It features host Roy Wood Jr. along with two illustrious team captains Amber Ruffin and Michael Ian Black to guide the guests through an array of games and quick-witted panel conversations that test their knowledge of current events.
